sentences.en: All the actors know the play backward.
sentences.cn: 所有演员对剧本都熟知到可以倒背如流.

sentences.en: At a certain age, it's not viable for men to take a backward step into unskilled work.
sentences.cn: 到了一定的年龄，就不可能再退回去干不需要技能的工作。

sentences.en: Backward children need a special kind of schooling.
sentences.cn: 天赋差的孩子需要特殊的教育.

sentences.en: Browse diagrams keep a history of the views it displays so that you can navigate forward and backward from each view.
sentences.cn: 浏览图可以保持它所显示视图的历史记录，因此您可以从任何一个视图向前或者向后导航。

sentences.en: He did a brilliant backward somersault.
sentences.cn: 他翻了个漂亮的后翻跟头.

sentences.en: He looked backward ( s ) forty years.
sentences.cn: 他回顾到四十年前.

sentences.en: He stepped backward and fell over the cliff.
sentences.cn: 他向后退了一步就从悬崖上掉下去了.

sentences.en: He took two steps backward.
sentences.cn: 他后退了两步。

sentences.en: He unlocked the door of apartment two and disappeared inside after a backward glance at Larry.
sentences.cn: 他打开2号公寓的门锁，向后瞥了拉里一眼之后走进去就不见了。

sentences.en: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.cn: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

sentences.en: I'm very dissatisfied with him because he's slipping backward day by day.
sentences.cn: 我很不满意他,因为他的思想一天一天地回到旧的路上去了.

sentences.en: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.cn: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.en: The backward place has changed into an industrial centre.
sentences.cn: 那落后的地方变成了工业中心.

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: The crops are backward this year.
sentences.cn: 今年的收获期较往年晚.

sentences.en: The crops are early [ backward ] this year.
sentences.cn: 今年的庄稼早 [ 晚 ] 熟.

sentences.en: The current U.S. farm bill, however, is a big step backward.
sentences.cn: 然而，目前的美国农业法却倒退了一大步。

sentences.en: The diver flipped over backward into the water.
sentences.cn: 跳水运动员向后翻转跳入水中。

sentences.en: The rainy season is backward this year.
sentences.cn: 今年雨季来得晚.

sentences.en: This country is going backward.
sentences.cn: 这个国家正在倒退。

sentences.en: We bent over backward to help them.
sentences.cn: 我们尽了最大努力帮助他们.

sentences.en: We need to accelerate the pace of change in our backward country.
sentences.cn: 我们应当为落后的祖国加快变革的脚步。

words.tran_cn: 无背的；无靠背的；无后盾的
以前；向后地；来回地；上溯
后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
支持；使后退（back的过去分词）
迟疑的,不情愿的,固执的

phrases.tran_cn: 反挤压；反向挤压；逆向挤制
倒毛跟斗；倒筋斗跳；后空翻

phrases.phrase: bend over backward 或 lean over backward
phrases.tran_cn: 竭尽全力：做比所需的更大的努力

trans.tran_cn: 向后的，倒退的，落后的，迟钝的
trans.tran_en: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you move or look backward, you move or look in the direction that your back is facing
